name: acidbox
description: Spawns a pool of spitter acid around box.

name: airstrikebox
description: Creates F-18 jets that fly pass, randomly shooting missiles.

name: bingobox
description: Randomly gain or lose up to -500 points.

name: blazebox
description: A shield of fire protects you from all zombies and special infected (except the tank!)

name: bloodbox
description: Reduces the amount of times you can get incapacitated to 1.

name: bonusbox
description: Increases the amount of points and drops from special infected.

name: boombox
description: Creates a small explosion.

name: boomerbox
description: Only boomer special infected.

name: bossbox
description: Doubles the amount of special infected.

name: bridebox
description: Spawns 4 and more bride witches by box!

name: bwbox
description: The player becomes black and white.

name: chargerbox
description: Only charger special infected.

name: cloudbox
description: Spawns a toxic cloud that can hurt players over time if standing in it.

name: expiredbox
description: You become black and white with 1hp!

name: explosionbox
description: Creates an explosion that can incapacitate/kill players!

name: failbox
description: No more drops from special infected!

name: flamebox
description: Player is on fire until incapacitated.

name: freezebox
description: Freezes nearby players.

name: grenadebox
description: Gives the player a grenade launcher.

name: hardbox
description: Increases the difficulty.

name: healbox
description: Heals the player’s life to 100%. Has a chance to bring dead players back to life.

name: hellbox
description: Creates an explosion each second for 5 times on the player that opened the box! Beware!

name: huntingbox
description: Only hunter special infected.

name: icebox
description: Freezes you

name: laserbox
description: Spawns the laser sight upgrades box.

name: lifebox
description: Gives the player 200hp.

name: medbox
description: Spawns medikits, defibrillators, pills or adrenaline shots.

name: meteorbox
description: Creates meteors that fall from the sky for a short time period.

name: multiplebox
description: Spawns multiple boxes.

name: nextbox
description: Shows what box is next.

name: panicbox
description: Calls a horde of random uncommon zombies.

name: pointsbox
description: Player receives +500 points.

name: realismbox
description: Deactivates the halos/glow around all players and items.

name: respawnbox
description: Brings dead players back to life.

name: spitterbox
description: Only spitter special infected.

name: tankbox
description: Spawns a regular/super tank OR turns player into tank!

name: tinybox
description: Zombies become smaller.

name: vomitbox
description: Vomits nearby players.

name: weaponbox
description: Player receives a random weapon. (scout, spas, or AWP)

name: whitebox
description: All players become black and white!

name: witchbox
description: Spawns 10 witches in a random place.
